data.text: Yake vi Agur ƒe nyagblɔɖi.
“Nyee tsi bome wu le amewo dome;
Nyemesrɔ̃ nunya
Ame kae lia yi dziƒo gagbɔ kpɔ?
“Kpɔtsɔtsɔ mele Mawu ƒe nya aɖeke ŋu o;
Mègatsɔ nya kpe eƒe nyawo o,
“O Yehowa, nu evee mebia wò;
Te aʋatsokaka kple alakpa ɖa xaa tso gbɔnye,
Ne menye nenema o la, mava ɖi ƒo akpa,
“Mègagblẽ dɔla ŋu na eƒe aƒetɔ o,
“Ame aɖewo li,
ame siwo dza le woawo ŋutɔ ƒe ŋkume, evɔ womeklɔ ɖi si
ame siwo si ŋku gã le ɣe sia ɣi,
ame siwo ƒe aɖu le abe yi ene
“Vinyɔnu eve le axɔ̃ si,
woawoe nye, yɔdo,
“Ŋku si ɖua fewu le fofoa ŋu,
“Nu etɔ̃ li siwo wɔ nuku nam akpa,
hɔ̃ ƒe mɔ le yame,
“Esiae nye nyɔnu ahasitɔ ƒe mɔ.
“Nu etɔ̃ tee anyigba ʋuʋuna le kpekpekpe,
woawoe nye, dɔla si va zu fia,
ne nyɔnu si ame aɖeke melɔ̃ eƒe nya o,
“Nu ene le anyigba dzi le sue,
anyidiwo nye nuwɔwɔ si ŋu ŋusẽ sue aɖe ko le,
kpetomefiwo nye lã siwo ŋu ŋusẽ sue aɖe ko le,
Fia mele ʋetsuviwo si o,
woate ŋu alé adoglo kple asi,
“Nu etɔ̃e zɔa agozɔli
dzata si nye gã le lã wɔadãwo dome eye medoa megbefɔ le naneke gbɔ o;
koklotsu,
“Ne ètsi bome hedo ɖokuiwò ɖe dzi
Elabena abe ale si ne woƒo nyinotsi wòzua bɔta
